title: Item Sets
body: I was disappointed in the Alpha client because there wasn't the item set feature. The item set feature is very useful for me! I have different item sets for the champs that I main with. With the item set feature it saved me time from searching items in a match.

replies.body: Can't promise anything, all I can say is that there has been internal discussion.

I find that while I don't use "Item Sets" for the intended purpose. It's still a great way to have an in-client menu for all the different items in the game. It has come in handy in many discussions with friends over Skype/Discord.
This. If we can't have item sets, it would be great to at least be able to see items in the client without having to go to the wiki.

yeah, should i hurry up and use the other client to make item sets i can still use in the alpha? because it doesnt even get rid of the ones you already have, which, though better than deleting them for no reason, is awkward
